Beyond the post-apocalyptic ruins of Moscow, in the tunnels of the Metro, the remnants of mankind are besieged by deadly threats from outside ... and inside. Mutants stalk the catacombs beneath the desolate surface, and hunt from the skies poisoned the surface. Instead of staying together, the city-states of the Metro are locked in a struggle for the ultimate power, a contraption holocaustic found the military vaults of D6. A civil war able to wipe humanity from the face of the earth definitively is not forged. As Artyom, burdened by guilt but driven by hope, you hold the key of it ... the last light in our darkest hour .
